rev.comment: Most of this can and is summarized in one earlier sentence. Also the "true" part reads more like a personal opinion since the games hasn't really given us a definitive answear.
rv, wrong - Her height is 90cm, which translates to 2ft 11in
rv vandalism - A film does not exist.

Tagging [[:Image:Amy yardley.jpg]] which is up for deletion per [[WP:CSD|CSD]] via [[WP:TWINKLE|tw]]
She was created by Shogakukan, who published the comic book she debuted in, not Kazayuki Hoshino, a video game employee
